Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
Fighting continues between minor powers in the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRimwardPeriphery],Rimward Periphery]], while it appears [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreLiaoCCAF],Capellan forces]] have increased raiding activity on [[DM.Factions[faction_Davion],Federated Suns]] systems near the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LorePeriphery],Periphery]] borders.



Two new 'Mech variant have been spotted in the field.  Throughout the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreSteinerLCAF],LCAF]] a new version of their beloved [[DM.MechDefs[mechdef_commando_COM-3A],Commando]] has been seen and it seems like it is causing quite a stir.



Meanwhile, the neighboring [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreKuritaDCMS],DCMS]] has unveiled the [[DM.MechDefs[mechdef_hermesII_HER-4K],Hermes III]], which appears to be thanks to the fruit born of the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreKapteynAccords],Concord of Kapteyn]].

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMercHatchysHelpers],Hatchy's Helpers]] have been dispatched to the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRimwardPeriphery],Rimward Frontier]] region to assist with an apparent Periphery Pox outbreak.  ComStar has aided the Helpers by providing priority [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHPG],HPG]] access routing for any reported outbreaks.  A cure is still being searched for.



Please report cases to any local [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreComStarAdept],ComStar Adept]].





This has been the CNB May broadcast.
